product_name: Outdoor Research Sombriolet Bucket Hat - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Sombriolet Bucket Hat from Outdoor Research defends your head from fierce sun on cloudless days with UPF 50+ sun protection. Lightweight, breathable nylon/polyester hat offers outstanding UPF 50+ protection from harmful UV rays. Moisture-wicking headband keeps you comfy on hot days. Removable chinstrap keeps the hat firmly planted on your head despite gusty conditions. Foam-stiffened brim floats, making this hat great for boating and water sports. Sombriolet Bucket Hat from Outdoor Research lets you snug the fit with an internal cinch cord. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Sombriolet Bucket Hat from Outdoor Research defends your head from fierce sun on cloudless days with UPF 50+ sun protection.
